*R/data.R*

## gapminder

## Description
 A data set containing Gapminder data used for vignettes 

## Format

 A data frame with 1704 rows and 6 variables:  

country

Country name.

 

continent

Continent name.

 

year

Year data was collected.

 

lifeExp

Life expectancy.

 

pop

Population size.

 

gdpPercap

GDP per capita.

  

## Usage
```r
 
gapminder 
```
